description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Conquer more than 60 levels in this physics-based 2d puzzle platformer. Solve ever more devious puzzles and collect all the eggs to be crowned the Easter Bunny!  This family friendly game will take you through fiery pits, and across rickety bridges as you climb the Easter Tower in pursuit of the most prestigious title that can be bestowed upon bunnies!
